Reviews.Title: “A very nice stay. Will stay again”
Reviews.Author: rowgray
Reviews.Content: husband returned home stay royal st charles hotel celebrating 18th wedding anniversary scared staying horrible reviews read hotel expecting 5 star hotel helped alot hotel location 5 mins bourbon street river walk harrahs staff nice helpful lots reviewers complained valet parking total 15 mins car time called granted stay mardi gras superbowl city packed tourist recommend stay royal st charles hotel coming orleans enjoy city close main attractions bathroom slightly clean hot water clean towels clean customer service fantastic price thanks royal st charles memorable 18th anniversary weekend signed pleasantly pleased
